item.title: D3 Demo
item.description: World Cup circle { fill: orange; stroke: black; stroke-width: 0.35; opacity: 0.7; } div.years_buttons { position: fixed; top: 5px; left: 50px; } div.years_buttons div { background-color: rgb(251, 201, 127); padding: 3px; margin: 7px; } function draw(geo_data) { "use strict"; var margin = 37, width = 700 - margin, height = 300 - margin; var svg = d3.select(".post-content") .append("svg") .attr("width", width + margin) .attr("height", height + margin) .append('g') .attr('class', 'map'); var
